aic2025.user

Interface UnitController


  • public interface UnitController
    Each unit has associated an instance of this class. It allows the unit to interact with the environment.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description

      Broadcasts a given message.

      Returns if this unit can act at all.

      Returns if this unit can broadcast a given message.

      Returns if the unit can craft the asked craftable.

      • getUnitInfo

        UnitInfo getUnitInfo()
        Returns the information about this unit. It costs 1 energy.
        Returns:
        the information about this unit.

      • getLocation

        Location getLocation()
        Returns the location of this unit. Returns null if this unit is outside the map. It costs 1 energy.
        Returns:
        the location of this unit.

        Returns this unit's team. It costs 1 energy.
        Returns:

        Returns this unit's opponent. It costs 1 energy.

        int getMapWidth()
        Returns the width of the map. It costs 1 energy.
        Returns:

        int getID()
        Returns the ID of this unit. It costs 1 energy.
        Returns:

        Location getBed()
        Returns the location of the bed associated to this unit. It costs 1 energy.
        Returns:
        the location of the bed associated to this unit.

      • getVisionRange

        int getVisionRange()
        Returns the unit's vision range. It costs 1 energy.
        Returns:
        The unit's vision range.

      • canMove

        boolean canMove(Direction dir)
        Returns if this unit can move in a given direction. If the direction is null it returns if the unit can move at all. It costs 20 energy.
        Parameters:
        dir - Given direction.
        Returns:
        if this unit can move in a given direction.

      • canMove

        boolean canMove()
        Returns if this unit can at all. It costs 20 energy.
        Returns:
        if this unit can move.

      • canAct

        boolean canAct()
        Returns if this unit can act at all. It costs 20 energy.
        Returns:
        if this unit can act.

      • move

        void move(Direction dir)
        Moves this unit in the given direction. There is a penalty if this action cannot be performed or if the direction is null. It costs 100 energy.
        Parameters:
        dir - Given direction.

      • canGather

        boolean canGather()
        Returns if this unit can gather the material at the tile of its current location (without using craftables). It costs 20 energy.
        Returns:
        if this unit can gather the material at the tile of its current location.

      • gather

        void gather()
        Gathers the material at this location (without craftables). There is a penalty if this unit cannot perform this action. It costs 100 energy.

      • canCraft

        boolean canCraft(Craftable craftable)
        Returns if the unit can craft the asked craftable. It will be able to craft it if the required materials are possessed. It costs 20 energy.
        Parameters:
        craftable - Craftable asked if it's possible to create.
        Returns:
        If the asked craftable is possible to create.

      • craft

        void craft(Craftable craftable)
        Crafts the given craftable. The required materials are spent, and the craftable is added to the inventory. There is a penalty if this unit cannot perform this action. It costs 100 energy.
        Parameters:
        craftable - Craftable to create.

      • canUpgrade

        boolean canUpgrade(Craftable craftable,
                   Upgrade upgrade)
        Returns if the unit can upgrade the given craftable with the given upgrade. This is true if the unit possesses both (at least one) craftable and one material of the given upgrade. It costs 20 energy.
        Parameters:
        craftable - Craftable to upgrade.
        upgrade - Upgrade to use.
        Returns:
        If the craftable can be upgraded.

      • upgrade

        void upgrade(Craftable craftable,
             Upgrade upgrade)
        Upgrades the given craftable to the specified upgrade. This counts as an action and adds action cooldown. It upgrades the lowest upgrade existing craftable into the specified new upgrade. There is a penalty if this unit cannot perform this action. It costs 100 energy.
        Parameters:
        craftable - Craftable to upgrade.
        upgrade - Upgrade to use.

      • getCraftablesAtChestList

        CraftableInfo[] getCraftablesAtChestList(Location chestLocation)
        Returns an array of craftables contained inside the chest in the specified location. The length of the array corresponds to how many craftables are inside the chest (there is one element for each craftable). It receives a penalty if the given location cannot be sensed by this unit. It costs 100 energy.
        Parameters:
        chestLocation - Location of the chest.
        Returns:
        The craftables contained in the chest present in the location, or null if there is no chest.

      • getCraftablesAtChest

        int[][] getCraftablesAtChest(Location chestLocation)
        Returns an array of craftables contained inside the chest in the specified location. The amount of craftables c with Upgrade u can be accessed at position [c.ordinal()][u.ordinal()]. It receives a penalty if the given location cannot be sensed by this unit. It costs 50 energy.
        Parameters:
        chestLocation - Location of the chest.
        Returns:
        The craftables contained in the chest present in the location, or null if there is no chest.

      • getMaterialsAtChest

        int[] getMaterialsAtChest(Location chestLocation)
        Returns an array of materials contained inside the chest in the specified location. The amount of material m can be accessed at position [m.ordinal()]. It receives a penalty if the given location cannot be sensed by this unit. It costs 50 energy.
        Parameters:
        chestLocation - Location of the chest.
        Returns:
        The materials contained in the chest present in the location, or null if there is no chest.

      • canMoveItemFromChest

        boolean canMoveItemFromChest(boolean deposit,
                             boolean material,
                             int typeIndex,
                             int upgradeIndex)
        Checks if the unit can move an item from the chest to its own inventory or vice versa. It receives a penalty if the given indexes are out of range of the enums. It costs 10 energy.
        Parameters:
        deposit - True if depositing one item from the inventory to the chest, false if retrieving an item from the chest to the inventory.
        material - True if the interaction is for a material, false if it is for a craftable.
        typeIndex - Index (ordinal of the enum) of the material/craftable to move.
        upgradeIndex - In case a craftable is being moved, index (ordinal of the enum) of the upgrade of the craftable to move.
        Returns:
        If the craftable/material move action can be performed.

      • moveItemFromChest

        void moveItemFromChest(boolean deposit,
                       boolean material,
                       int typeIndex,
                       int upgradeIndex)
        Moves an item from the chest to its own inventory or vice versa. It receives a penalty if the action can't be performed. It costs 20 energy.
        Parameters:
        deposit - True if depositing one item from the inventory to the chest, false if retrieving an item from the chest to the inventory.
        material - True if the interaction is for a material, false if it is for a craftable.
        typeIndex - Index (ordinal of the enum) of the material/craftable to move.
        upgradeIndex - In case a craftable is being moved, index (ordinal of the enum) of the upgrade of the craftable to move.

      • getBedInfo

        BedInfo getBedInfo(Location loc)
        Returns the bed info of the bed in the given location, or null if there is no bed. It receives a penalty if the given location cannot be sensed by this unit. It costs 20 energy.
        Parameters:
        loc - Location of the bed.
        Returns:
        The BedInfo associated with the bed in the location, or null if there is no bed.

      • getAllBedsInfo

        BedInfo[] getAllBedsInfo()
        Returns the bed info of all beds owned by the own team. This is useful to get to know the possible spawn locations. It costs 100 energy.
        Returns:
        An array of BedInfo for each bed owned by the team.

      • canSpawn

        boolean canSpawn(Location loc)
        Returns if the unit can spawn in the given location. That is, if there is a bed of the own team that is not occupied and the location is not obstructed. It receives a penalty if the given location cannot be sensed by this unit. It costs 20 energy.
        Parameters:
        loc - Location to spawn.
        Returns:
        True if the unit can spawn on this location.

      • spawn

        void spawn(Location loc)
        Spawns the unit on the map on the given location. It receives a penalty if the action can't be performed. It costs 100 energy.
        Parameters:
        loc - Location to spawn.

      • isOnMap

        boolean isOnMap()
        Returns if the unit is on the map (is alive). It costs 5 energy.
        Returns:
        if the unit is on the map (is alive).

      • getNumberOfMaterials

        int getNumberOfMaterials(Material material)
        Returns the number of materials carried by the unit of the specified type. It receives a penalty if the given material is null. It costs 20 energy.
        Parameters:
        material - Type of material to get the amount being carried by the unit.
        Returns:
        the number of materials carried by the unit of the specified type.

      • getUpgrade

        Upgrade getUpgrade(Craftable craftable)
        Returns the highest upgrade of the given craftable owned by the unit. It receives a penalty if the given craftable is null, or if the unit doesn't have any craftable of that type. It costs 10 energy.
        Parameters:
        craftable - Craftable to get the upgrade.
        Returns:
        the upgrade of the given craftable.

      • hasCraftable

        boolean hasCraftable(Craftable craftable)
        Returns if the unit has at least one of the given craftable. It receives a penalty if the given craftable is null. It costs 5 energy.
        Parameters:
        craftable - Craftable to check if the unit possesses it.
        Returns:
        if the unit has at least one of the given craftable.

      • destroyMaterial

        void destroyMaterial(Material material)
        Destroys one material of the specified type. It receives a penalty if the unit does not possess any material of the given type. It costs 10 energy.
        Parameters:
        material - type of material to destroy.

      • destroyCraftable

        void destroyCraftable(Craftable craftable)
        Destroys one craftable of the specified type. It prioritizes craftables with lower upgrades. It receives a penalty if the unit does not possess any craftable of the given type. It costs 10 energy.
        Parameters:
        craftable - type of material to destroy.

      • getBeacons

        int getBeacons()
        Returns the number of beacons placed by the team. It costs 10 energy.
        Returns:
        the number of beacons placed by the team.

      • getCraftedBeacons

        int getCraftedBeacons()
        Returns the number of beacons crafted by the team from the start of the game (counts those that were destroyed as well). It costs 10 energy.
        Returns:
        the number of beacons crafted by the team

      • hasNearbyComposter

        boolean hasNearbyComposter(Location loc)
        Returns if the specified location is affected by a nearby composter. It receives a penalty if the location is null. It costs 10 energy.
        Parameters:
        loc - location to check if it's affected by a nearby composter.
        Returns:
        if the specified location is affected by a nearby composter.

      • canSenseLocation

        boolean canSenseLocation(Location loc)
        Returns if the unit can sense target location. It returns true if and only if the location is on the map, inside the unit's vision range, and if it has enough illumination. It receives a penalty if the given location is null. It costs 10 energy.
        Parameters:
        loc - Target location.
        Returns:
        if the unit can sense target location.

      • isOutOfMap

        boolean isOutOfMap(Location loc)
        Returns if the given location is outside the map. There is a penalty if the given location is null. It costs 10 energy.
        Parameters:
        loc - Given location
        Returns:
        if the given location is outside the map.

      • senseMaterialAtLocation

        Material senseMaterialAtLocation(Location loc)
        Returns the information of the material at a given location. It receives a penalty if the given location cannot be sensed by this unit. It costs 10 energy.
        Parameters:
        loc - Given location
        Returns:
        the information of the material at a given location.

      • senseMaterials

        Location[] senseMaterials(Material material,
                          float radiusSquared)
        Returns an array with all visible materials of a given type inside the map and inside a given radius. It receives a penalty if the given radius is negative. It costs 200 energy.
        Parameters:
        material - Given material
        radiusSquared - Given radius (squared)
        Returns:
        an array with all visible materials of a given type inside the map and inside a given radius.

      • senseUnitAtLocation

        UnitInfo senseUnitAtLocation(Location loc)
        Returns the information of the unit at a given location. It returns null if there is no unit. It receives a penalty if the given location cannot be sensed by this unit. It costs 10 energy.
        Parameters:
        loc - Given location
        Returns:
        the information of the unit at a given location.

      • senseStructureAtLocation

        StructureInfo senseStructureAtLocation(Location loc)
        Returns the information of the structure at a given location. It returns null if there is no structure. It receives a penalty if the given location cannot be sensed by this unit. It costs 10 energy.
        Parameters:
        loc - Given location
        Returns:
        the information of the structure at a given location.

      • senseUnits

        UnitInfo[] senseUnits(float radiusSquared,
                      Team team)
        Returns an array with all other units of a given team that can be sensed by this unit inside a given radius around it. It receives a penalty if the radius is negative. If the team is null, it returns the astronauts of all teams. It costs 200 energy.
        Parameters:
        radiusSquared - Given radius (squared)
        team - Given team
        Returns:
        an array with all other units of a given team that can be sensed by this unit inside a given radius around it.

      • senseStructures

        StructureInfo[] senseStructures(float radiusSquared,
                                Team team,
                                StructureType type)
        Returns an array with all other structures of a given team that can be sensed by this unit inside a given radius around it. It receives a penalty if the radius is negative. If the team is null, it returns the structures of all teams. If the type is null, it returns all types of structures. It costs 200 energy.
        Parameters:
        radiusSquared - Given radius (squared)
        team - Given team
        type - Given type
        Returns:
        an array with all other structures of a given team and a given type that can be sensed by this unit inside a given radius around it.

      • senseMaterials

        MaterialInfo[] senseMaterials(float radiusSquared)
        Returns an array with the information of materials sensed by this unit inside a given radius around it. It receives a penalty if the radius is negative. It costs 200 energy.
        Parameters:
        radiusSquared - Given radius (squared)
        Returns:
        an array with the information of materials sensed by this unit inside a given radius around it.

      • canUseCraftable

        boolean canUseCraftable(Craftable craftable,
                        Location location)
        Returns if this unit can use a given craftable at a target location. There is a penalty if any value is null. It costs 20 energy.
        Parameters:
        craftable - given craftable
        location - target location
        Returns:
        if this unit can use a given craftable at a target location.

      • useCraftable

        void useCraftable(Craftable craftable,
                  Location location)
        Uses a given craftable at a target location. There is a penalty if this unit cannot perform this action. It costs 100 energy.
        Parameters:
        craftable - given craftable
        location - target location.

      • pollBroadcast

        BroadcastInfo pollBroadcast()
        Returns the front element of the broadcast buffer and removes that element from the buffer. It returns null if empty. It costs 10 energy.
        Returns:
        the front element of the broadcast buffer and removes that element from the buffer.

      • canBroadcastMessage

        boolean canBroadcastMessage(int message)
        Returns if this unit can broadcast a given message. It costs 20 energy.
        Parameters:
        message - given message
        Returns:
        if this unit can broadcast a given message.

      • broadcastMessage

        void broadcastMessage(int message)
        Broadcasts a given message. There is a penalty if the unit cannot perform this action. It costs 100 energy.
        Parameters:
        message - given message.

      • cleanBroadcastBuffer

        void cleanBroadcastBuffer()
        Erases all elements from the broadcast buffer. It costs 10 energy.

      • eraseBroadcastBuffer

        void eraseBroadcastBuffer(int n)
        Erases the first n elements from the broadcast buffer. There is a penalty if n is negative. It costs 10 energy.
        Parameters:
        n - Number of elements to be erased.

      • getRound

        int getRound()
        Returns current game round. It costs 1 energy.
        Returns:
        current game round.

      • getEnergyUsed

        int getEnergyUsed()
        Returns the energy used by this unit so far. It costs 1 energy.
        Returns:
        the energy used by this unit so far.

      • getEnergyLeft

        int getEnergyLeft()
        Returns this unit's remaining energy. It costs 1 energy.
        Returns:
        this unit's remaining energy.

      • getPercentageOfEnergyLeft

        double getPercentageOfEnergyLeft()
        Returns the fraction of remaining energy over this unit's total energy. It costs 1 energy.
        Returns:
        the fraction of remaining energy over this unit's total energy.

      • getPercentageOfEnergyUsed

        double getPercentageOfEnergyUsed()
        Returns the percentage of this unit's total energy used so far. It costs 1 energy.
        Returns:
        the percentage of this unit's total energy used so far.

      • println

        void println(java.lang.Object o)
        Prints an object o for debug purposes. It costs 20 energy.
        Parameters:
        o - given object.

      • drawPointDebug

        void drawPointDebug(Location loc,
                    int r,
                    int g,
                    int b)
        Draws a point on the map at a given location and with a given color scheme (in rgb-coordinates). It receives a penalty if the location is null or if the color scheme is not valid. It costs 20 energy.
        Parameters:
        loc - Given location.
        r - r-coordinate
        g - g-coordinate
        b - b-coordinate

      • drawLineDebug

        void drawLineDebug(Location fromLoc,
                   Location toLoc,
                   int r,
                   int g,
                   int b)
        Draws a segment on the map between a given pair of locations and with a given color scheme (in rgb-coordinates). It receives a penalty if any of the location are null or if the color scheme is not valid. It costs 20 energy.
        Parameters:
        fromLoc - First location.
        toLoc - Second location.
        r - r-coordinate
        g - g-coordinate
        b - b-coordinate

      • getRandomDouble

        double getRandomDouble()
        Returns a randomly generated double. If this is the only random method used by both teams, all of their games with a fixed seed are identical. It costs 1 energy.
        Returns:
        a randomly generated double.

      • yield

        void yield()
        Halts this unit's execution until the next round. It costs 1 energy.
